note:
Colorado-based, with stops in L.A., NYC, Florida gulf coast and Boston.

A bit of a spreadsheet dad and a satisfied mediocre cyclist. News audience, product and future guy during select daylight hours. Started Denverite, worked at CPR News, Denver Post, HuffPost, GOOD and other places.

Posts are sort of a mix of how information flows, outdoor adventures and photos, Colorado information, and fun seasonal obsessions.
